title: Border, ca. 1830
dimensions: Overall: 431.8 x 56.6 cm (14 ft. 2 in. x 22 5/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from the Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program, General Acquisitions Endowment, Eleanor G. Hewitt, and Pauline Cooper Noyes Funds
description: Printed two borders across width, continuous floral garland on gray satin ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, ca. 1830.
ca. 1830. Block-printed on continuous paper. Museum purchase from the Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program, General Acquisitions Endowment, Eleanor G. Hewitt, and Pauline Cooper Noyes Funds. 1994-101-6.
